definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Heilongjiang river has the abundant water resources in boundary block, the engineering condition is superior.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙江干流界河段水力资源丰富，工程条件优越。

sentences.english: Shifosi reservoir is an important reservoir of Liaohe main stream.
sentences.chinese: 石佛寺水库是辽河干流的一座重要水库。

sentences.english: Xing'an have originated in the Xiangjiang River in Guangxi, length 226 km.
sentences.chinese: 境内有发源于广西兴安的湘江干流，全长226公里。

sentences.english: Zhaoyuan section is the frontage of monitoring water quality of Songhua River main stream.
sentences.chinese: 松花江肇源江段是松花江干流水质监测的前哨。

sentences.english: There is higher mercury in the soil near Wu Jiang River.
sentences.chinese: 乌江流域土壤含汞值高，在乌江干流将进行九级开发。

sentences.english: Due to the main stream top support action, N, P expressed possessing space distribution character of peak value.
sentences.chinese: 由于干流顶托作用，氮磷呈现具峰值的空间分布特征。

sentences.english: Discreet stream path for auxiliary audio signals.
sentences.chinese: 辅助音频信号的干流通道。

sentences.english: Nierji water complex is a control project in Nenjiang river mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 尼尔基水利枢纽是嫩江干流控制性工程。

sentences.english: Yellow River trunk stream RWTR market among regions is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了黄河干流区域间取水权市场。

sentences.english: Sturgeons (Acipenser schrencki Brandt and Huso dauricus) are of important commercial fishes in Heilong Jiang River.
sentences.chinese: 科鱼类是黑龙江干流重要经济鱼类。

sentences.english: Jinping First Stage Hydropower Station is an important cascade hydropower station located on Yalong River in Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 锦屏一级水电站是雅砻江干流上的重要梯级电站。

definition: inland river/river draining to inland sea
Yalong river of Tibet and Sichuan
